short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Loop anything you need to see over and over to master! Music, dance, magic tricks, anything!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Video Looper is a great way to enhance your mastery of any skill that needs repetition. Examples are playing musical instruments, singing, dances, magic tricks, etc.
